parameters.text:
=You are a media metadata expert specializing in Jellyfin organization. Analyze this filename for Jellyfin organization: "{{ $json.originalName }}"
Likely episode: {{ $json.isLikelyEpisode }}
Directory context: "{{ $json.directory }}"

Determine if this is a MOVIE or TV EPISODE and return ONLY valid JSON:

**For Movies:**
{
  "type": "movie",
  "title": "Proper Movie Title",
  "year": "YYYY",
  "edition": "Director's Cut" or null,
  "quality": "4K" or "1080p" or "720p" or null,
  "source": "BluRay" or "WEB-DL" or "DVD" or null,
  "confidence": 0.95,
  "jellyfin_folder": "Movie Title (Year)",
  "jellyfin_filename": "Movie Title (Year).ext",
  "full_path": "Movies/Movie Title (Year)/Movie Title (Year).ext"
}

**For TV Episodes:**
{
  "type": "episode",
  "show_title": "Show Name",
  "year": "YYYY" or null,
  "season": 1,
  "episode": 1,
  "episode_title": "Episode Name" or null,
  "quality": "1080p" or null,
  "source": "WEB-DL" or null,
  "confidence": 0.95,
  "jellyfin_show_folder": "Show Name (Year)",
  "jellyfin_season_folder": "Season 01",
  "jellyfin_filename": "Show Name (Year) - S01E01 - Episode Title.ext",
  "full_path": "TV Shows/Show Name (Year)/Season 01/Show Name (Year) - S01E01.ext"
}

Rules:
- Use exact titles from TMDB/TVDb when possible
- Extract season/episode numbers accurately
- Season folders: 2 digits (Season 01, Season 02)
- Episode numbers: 2 digits (S01E01, S02E15)
- If episode title unknown, omit from filename
- Confidence 0.0-1.0 based on certainty",
